video.title: Naruto
video.synopsis: Guided by the spirit demon within him, orphaned Naruto learns to harness his powers as a ninja in this anime adventure series.

episodes.synopsis: Enter the Village Hidden in the Leaves, where deadly ninjas roam the land and the mischievous Naruto Uzumaki causes trouble everywhere he goes.
episodes.title: Enter: Naruto Uzumaki!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto finally graduates from the Ninja Academy and claims to know it all.
episodes.title: My Name Is Konohamaru!

episodes.synopsis: On the way to becoming a ninja, Naruto must team up with his classmates, the pretty Sakura and the pretty serious Sasuke.
episodes.title: Sasuke and Sakura: Friends or Foes?

episodes.synopsis: Now that Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura are a team, they meet with their sensei, the enigmatic and aloof Kakashi.
episodes.title: Pass or Fail: Survival Test

episodes.synopsis: With the threat of failure hanging over their heads, Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura try everything they know to pass the grueling survival test.
episodes.title: You Failed! Kakashi's Final Decision

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and his squad start their first ninja missions with boring and menial tasks. Weary and angry, Naruto vents his frustration at the Hokage.
episodes.title: A Dangerous Mission! Journey to the Land of Waves!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and his squad arrive in the Land of the Waves and learn that an evil businessman named Gato has taken over the land.
episodes.title: The Assassin of the Mist!

episodes.synopsis: Kakashi has the upper hand in his battle with Zabuza.
episodes.title: The Oath of Pain

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to Naruto's ingenious plan, Kakashi is freed from the water prison.
episodes.title: Kakashi: Sharingan Warrior

episodes.synopsis: Recuperating at Tazuna's house, Kakashi is dissatisfied with the outcome of the battle.
episodes.title: The Forest of Chakra

episodes.synopsis: Sakura goes into town with Tazuna and sees the hardships that the people of the Land of Waves suffer under Gato's rule.
episodes.title: The Land Where a Hero Once Lived

episodes.synopsis: While Naruto concentrates on the training to control his chakra, a mysterious person suddenly appears before him.
episodes.title: Battle on the Bridge! Zabuza Returns!!

episodes.synopsis: Once again the time has come to fight Zabuza, and this time he's got company: the tracking ninja who supposedly killed him.
episodes.title: Haku's Secret Jutsu: Crystal Ice Mirrors

episodes.synopsis: Sasuke finds himself in a pinch inside of Haku's Crystal Ice Mirrors, but Naruto comes to the rescue.
episodes.title: The Number One Hyperactive, Knucklehead Ninja Joins the Fight!!

episodes.synopsis: Realizing time is of the essence, Kakashi decides to use the Sharingan once again to defeat Zabuza.
episodes.title: Zero Visibility: The Sharingan Shatters

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and Sasuke continue to receive punishing attacks from within Haku's Crystal Ice Mirrors.
episodes.title: The Broken Seal

episodes.synopsis: Naruto finally explodes! His anger against Haku, who defeated Sasuke, unleashes the power of the Nine-tailed Fox.
episodes.title: White Past: Hidden Ambition

episodes.synopsis: Naruto strongly questions Haku's philosophy of existing only to fight and win. Meanwhile, the battle between Kakashi and Zabuza approaches its climax.
episodes.title: The Weapons Known as Shinobi

episodes.synopsis: Thinking of Haku, Naruto angrily confronts Zabuza. Zabuza is devastated by the loss of Haku, the only person he could trust in the world.
episodes.title: The Demon in the Snow

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and his team return to the Village Hidden in the Leaves after their battle in Land of Waves.
episodes.title: A New Chapter Begins: The Chunin Exam!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura are among those chosen to take the Chunin (middle rank ninja) Qualification Exam.
episodes.title: Identify Yourself: Powerful New Rivals

episodes.synopsis: As Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura prepare for the exam, a ninja with short hair and thick eyebrows named Rock Lee appears and challenges Sasuke to a duel.
episodes.title: Chunin Challenge: Rock Lee vs. Sasuke!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura register for the Chunin Exam, which joins three ninjas as a team. In order to pass, not a single member is allowed to fail.
episodes.title: Genin Takedown! All Nine Rookies Face Off!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and his team begin the first exam, a written test. The exam proctor is an upper rank ninja and infamous expert in interrogation.
episodes.title: Start Your Engines: The Chunin Exam Begins!

episodes.synopsis: The proctor declares what seems like a harsh and unreasonable rule for question 10, the hardest part of the first exam.
episodes.title: The Tenth Question: All or Nothing!

episodes.synopsis: Konohamaru, the grandson of the Leaf Village's Third Hokage, shows up at the Chunin Exam site.
episodes.title: Special Report: Live from the Forest of Death!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and his fellow participants arrive at the Forest of Death, the site of the second part of the Chunin Exam.
episodes.title: The Chunin Exam Stage 2: The Forest of Death

episodes.synopsis: The second exam starts in the Forest of Death. Sasuke notices that an enemy has disguised himself as Naruto.
episodes.title: Eat or Be Eaten: Panic in the Forest

episodes.synopsis: Deep within the Hidden Leaf Village, sharp and cunning ninjas carry an ultimate power, while Naruto Uzumaki holds the ultimate secret inside.
episodes.title: Naruto's Counterattack: Never Give In!

episodes.synopsis: Seeing Naruto furiously fight back against the Grass Ninja, Sasuke realizes that he was wrong to think about fleeing the scene of a battle.
episodes.title: The Sharingan Revived: Dragon-Flame Jutsu!

episodes.synopsis: After receiving the report from her staff, Anko senses that Orochimaru has snuck into the examination.
episodes.title: Bushy Brow's Pledge: Undying Love and Protection!

episodes.synopsis: Protecting Sakura, who can no longer move, Lee battles the three Sound Ninjas himself.
episodes.title: Sakura Blossoms!

episodes.synopsis: While Sakura fends off the Sound Ninja attack by herself, the rival Ino team appears!
episodes.title: Battle Formation: Ino-Shika-Cho!

episodes.synopsis: The Sound Ninjas depart after witnessing Sasuke's intense power. Naruto's team finally gets a moment of peace to recuperate.
episodes.title: Akamaru Trembles: Gaara's Cruel Strength!

episodes.synopsis: To heal their wounds, Naruto and his team rest after their battle against the Sound Ninjas -- but they have only one day to complete the exam.
episodes.title: The Scroll's Secret: No Peeking Allowed

episodes.synopsis: Naruto's team joins Kabuto on their journey to the tower, but on the way, they are trapped by the illusion technique of a low ranking ninja.
episodes.title: Clone vs. Clone: Mine are Better than Yours!

episodes.synopsis: When Naruto and his team open the two scrolls after reaching the tower, Iruka suddenly appears.
episodes.title: Surviving the Cut! The Rookie Nine Together Again!

episodes.synopsis: The 21 ninjas that passed the second exam assemble for their next challenge.
episodes.title: Narrowing the Field: Sudden Death Elimination!

episodes.synopsis: The preliminaries for the third exam are one-on-one combat, and the first match is between Sasuke and Orochimaru's minion Yoroi.
episodes.title: Bushy Brow's Jealousy: Lions Barrage Unleashed!

episodes.synopsis: As Kakashi releases Sasuke from the spell, Orochimaru shows up and expresses his desire for the power of Sharingan that the Uchiha clan holds.
episodes.title: Kakashi and Orochimaru: Face-to-Face!

episodes.synopsis: The preliminaries continue as the next match pits Sand Ninja Gaara's teammate Kankuro against Orochimaru's minion Misumi.
episodes.title: Kunoichi Rumble: The Rivals Get Serious!

episodes.synopsis: The fourth match is between Sakura and Ino, who are childhood friends and competitors for the affection of Sasuke.
episodes.title: The Ultimate Battle: Cha!

episodes.synopsis: The fifth match is between Tenten and Temari. The sixth match is Shikamaru versus Kin.
episodes.title: Killer Kunoichi and a Shaky Shikamaru

episodes.synopsis: In the seventh match, Naruto clashes against Kiba, who brings along his dog Akamaru.
episodes.title: Akamaru Unleashed! Who's Top Dog Now?

episodes.synopsis: By consuming Food Pills, Kiba and Akamaru increase their chakra levels and start their counterattack on Naruto.
episodes.title: Surprise Attack! Naruto's Secret Weapon!

episodes.synopsis: Cousins Hinata and Neji of the Hyuga clan confront each other in the eighth match.
episodes.title: Byakugan Battle: Hinata Grows Bold!

episodes.synopsis: When Hinata goes up against Neji, he hits her pressure point by using his Byakugan (white eyes), and she almost loses consciousness.
episodes.title: A Failure Stands Tall!

episodes.synopsis: Gaara finally appears in the ninth match, and his opponent is taijutsu (physical technique) specialist Lee.
episodes.title: Gaara vs. Rock Lee: The Power of Youth Explodes!

episodes.synopsis: Lee uses the banned technique Primary Lotus to attack Gaara.
episodes.title: Lee's Hidden Strength: Forbidden Secret Jutsu!

episodes.synopsis: Lee decides to use the forbidden move Hidden Lotus as a last resort.
episodes.title: The Fifth Gate: A Splendid Ninja Is Born

episodes.synopsis: In the final match of the preliminaries, Choji fights against Orochimaru's minion Dosu. When the preliminaries end, the Hokage reveals the third exam.
episodes.title: A Shadow in Darkness: Danger Approaches Sasuke

episodes.synopsis: In preparation for the third exam that starts in a month, Naruto's former mentor, Kakashi, chooses Ebisu to train the young ninja.
episodes.title: Ebisu Returns: Naruto's Toughest Training Yet!

episodes.synopsis: Jiraiya, one of the legendary Three Ninjas, suddenly appears before Ebisu and Naruto. Naruto gives Jiraiya the nickname, "Pervy Sage."
episodes.title: Long Time No See: Jiraiya Returns!

episodes.synopsis: The Sound Ninja Dosu appears and intends on defeating Gaara. But Gaara beats him soundly. Watching them are a Jonin of the Sand Village and Kabuto.
episodes.title: The Summoning Jutsu: Wisdom of the Toad Sage!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto continues training under Jiraiya to master the summoning jutsu. But he has a hard time controlling the chakra of the Nine-tailed Fox.
episodes.title: A Feeling of Yearning, a Flower Full of Hope

episodes.synopsis: It is three weeks since Naruto began training under Jiraiya. Naruto has been on the brink of collapse many times.
episodes.title: Live or Die: Risk it All to Win it All!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto is able to draw out the Nine-Tailed chakra and utilize the summoning jutsu. Gamabunta appears and does not believe that Naruto summoned him.
episodes.title: He Flies! He Jumps! He Lurks! Chief Toad Appears!

episodes.synopsis: On the day of the test, Gaara disappears from the inn where the Sand Ninjas are staying and goes to Hidden Leaf Hospital.
episodes.title: Hospital Besieged: The Evil Hand Revealed!

episodes.synopsis: The day of the Exam finally arrives. Naruto's first opponent is Neji Hyuga.
episodes.title: The Final Rounds: Rush to the Battle Arena!

episodes.synopsis: Finally, Chunin Exam starts with the eight ninjas who qualified in the preliminaries. But Sasuke is nowhere to be found.
episodes.title: Byakugan vs. Shadow Clone Jutsu!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto is unable to use his Shadow Clone Jutsu against Neji who can see chakra points!
episodes.title: Ultimate Defense: Zero Blind Spot!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and Neji's battle continue with Neji showing enormous power.
episodes.title: A Failure's True Power

episodes.synopsis: Defeated by Naruto, Neji is being taken to the hospital, when Neji's uncle Hiashi appears.
episodes.title: Hit it or Quit it: The Final Rounds Get Complicated!

episodes.synopsis: Sasuke's match is postponed and suddenly it is Shikamaru's turn. He has shown no eagerness to fight, thinking that his is merely a secondary match.
episodes.title: Zero Motivation: The Guy with Cloud Envy!

episodes.synopsis: In Shikamaru and Temari's match, Shikamaru -- who had the upper hand -- suddenly makes a surprising decision!
episodes.title: Dancing Leaf, Squirming Sand

episodes.synopsis: Sasuke and Gaara'a anticipated match begins. Gaara eerily talks to himself, as though addressing someone.
episodes.title: Bushy Brow's Jutsu: Sasuke Style!

episodes.synopsis: Sauske's speed and moves are identical to Lee's Taijutsu. But Gaara is not an opponent who can be defeated with just Taijutsu.
episodes.title: Late for the Show, But Ready to Go! The Ultimate Secret Technique Is Born!

episodes.synopsis: Someone has used genjutsu to put everyone in the arena to sleep. The Sand Ninjas, led by Orochimaru, have begun their plan to destroy the village.
episodes.title: Zero Hour! The Destuction of the Hidden Leaf Village Begins!

episodes.synopsis: The Sound and Sand Ninjas, along with Orochimaru, begin their move to destroy Hidden Leaf Village. The arena has become a battleground.
episodes.title: Village in Distress: A New A-Ranked Mission!

episodes.synopsis: Along with Pakkun, Naruto, Sakura and Shikamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke. Pakkun senses nine of Orochimaru's men coming after them.
episodes.title: A Shirker's Call to Action: Layabout No More!

episodes.synopsis: Orochimaru traps the Hokage inside a barrier and continue to battle.
episodes.title: An Unrivaled Match: Hokage Battle Royale!

episodes.synopsis: Sasuke finally catches up to Gaara, Temari and Kankuro. Kankuro escapes with Gaara, leaving Temari to face Sasuke.
episodes.title: A Mistake from the Past: A Face Revealed!

episodes.synopsis: The battle between the Hokage and Orochimaru rages on. The Hokage resorts to a jutsu unfamiliar to Orochimaru, known as the Reaper Death Seal.
episodes.title: Forbidden Secret Technique: Reaper Death Seal!

episodes.synopsis: Shino appears as Sasuke and Kankuro battle. Leaving Shino to handle Kankuro, Sasuke goes after Gaara.
episodes.title: Astonishing Truth! Gaara's Identity Emerges!

episodes.synopsis: Half of Gaara's body has transformed and Sasuke continues his battle against him.
episodes.title: Sasuke's Decision: Pushed to the Edge!

episodes.synopsis: By the time Naruto and Sakura catch up, Sasuke has exhausted his strength and collapsed.
episodes.title: Assassin of the Moonlit Night

episodes.synopsis: Naruto is helpless against Gaara's immense power. While Naruto declares that he fights for his comrades, Gaara says he fights for himself.
episodes.title: Light vs. Dark: The Two Faces of Gaara

episodes.synopsis: Naruto is helpless against Gaara's overpowering strength. However, he sees Sasuke risking life and limb to save him and Sakura.
episodes.title: Naruto's Ninja Handbook

episodes.synopsis: Gaara employs his Playing Possum Jutsu, which allows the Sand Spirit within him, Shukaku, to display its true power.
episodes.title: Beyond the Limit of Darkness and Light

episodes.synopsis: With every ounce of their power, Gaara and Naruto continue to fight. Determined to protect Sakura, Naruto attacks Gaara again and again.
episodes.title: The Third Hokage, Forever..

episodes.synopsis: Orochimaru's plan to destroy the Village Hidden in the Leaves is stopped. But the damage is extensive and work proceeds quickly to make repairs.
episodes.title: Return of the Morning Mist

episodes.synopsis: Kakashi arrives in the nick of time to help Asuma and Kurenai, and Itachi enters the fray as well. The battle between two Sharingan users begins.
episodes.title: Eye to Eye: Sharingan vs. Sharingan!

episodes.synopsis: Jiraiya and Naruto are on a journey to find Tsunade. Jiraiya's purpose is to protect Naruto from the clutches of the Akatsuki, and to train him.
episodes.title: Jiraiya: Naruto's Potential Disaster!

episodes.synopsis: Intent on confronting Itachi, Sasuke rushes to the town where Naruto is staying. On the way, tragic memories of his past come flooding back.
episodes.title: Roar, Chidori! Brother vs. Brother!

episodes.synopsis: Jiraiya saves Naruto from Kisame. It turns out that Itachi and the Akatsuki organization are after Naruto to obtain the power of the Nine-Tailed Fox.
episodes.title: Hate Among the Uchihas: The Last of the Clan!

episodes.synopsis: Deeply hurt mentally and physically, Sasuke is taken back to the Hidden Leaf Village by Guy. If only the medical specialist Tsunade were there...
episodes.title: A New Training Begins: I Will Be Strong!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto begins his training with Jiraiya. The technique Naruto will learn was the trademark of the Fourth Hokage and took three years to master.
episodes.title: Keep on Training: Pop Goes the Water Balloon!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto manages to complete the first step of his training. But the next step -- making a rubber ball explode with chakra -- proves to be difficult.
episodes.title: Focal Point: The Mark of the Leaf

episodes.synopsis: Orochimaru and Kabuto appear before Tsunade and Shizune. Orochimaru, injured by the Reaper Death Seal, seeks the former Sannin's medical expertise.
episodes.title: An Impossible Choice: The Pain Within Tsunade's Heart

episodes.synopsis: In exchange for healing his arms, Orochimaru offers to bring back to life both Tsunade's younger brother Nawaki and Dan, her sweetheart.
episodes.title: Unforgivable! A Total Lack of Respect!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto is incensed at the way Tsunade disrespects the position of Hokage and challenges her to a fight.
episodes.title: Inheritance! The Necklace of Death!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto practices hard so he can win the necklace from Tsunade. Meanwhile, Tsunade is in a dilemma over Orochimaru's offer.
episodes.title: A Dubious Offer! Tsunade's Choice

episodes.synopsis: Gripped by the desire to see Nawaki and Dan, Tsunade almost succumbs to Orochimaru's tempting offer.
episodes.title: Breakdown! The Deal Is Off!

episodes.synopsis: Orochimaru and Kabuto use a summoning jutsu to call forth a giant snake. Still drugged and unable to fully use his chakra, Jiraiya summons Gamakichi.
episodes.title: Attack! Fury of the Rasengan!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto's ninja way is to never go back on his word. Naruto is seriously injured by Kabuto and hovers on the verge of death.
episodes.title: The Fifth Hokage! A Life on the Line!

episodes.synopsis: Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru all release their summoning jutsu. And a fierce battle begins.
episodes.title: Deadlock! Sannin Showdown!

episodes.synopsis: As Tsunade, Naruto and the others head back to the Leaf Village where Tsunade will become the Fifth Hokage, they stop at a town with hot springs.
episodes.title: Kidnapped! Naruto's Hot Spring Adventure!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to not pursue becoming a shinobi.
episodes.title: Tsunade's Warning: Ninja No More!

episodes.synopsis: Tsunade asks Lee whether he will quit pursuing the path of a ninja or choose to undergo a risky surgery with only a 50 percent chance of success.
episodes.title: The Will of Fire Still Burns

episodes.synopsis: Tsunade advises Lee to quit the path of the shinobi. Unable to master either ninjutsu or genjutsu, Lee has always been looked down upon by the others.
episodes.title: Sensei and Student: The Bond of the Shinobi

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his face.
episodes.title: Gotta See! Gotta Know! Kakashi Sensei's True Face!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.
episodes.title: Mission: Help an Old Friend in the Land of Tea!

episodes.synopsis: The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.
episodes.title: The Race is On! Trouble on the High Seas!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.
episodes.title: Run Idate Run! Nagi Island Awaits!

episodes.synopsis: Idate still trusts no one, and it's revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idate's older brother was the proctor who posed the 10th question.
episodes.title: A Fierce Battle of Rolling Thunder!

episodes.synopsis: Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.
episodes.title: The Last Leg: A Final Act of Desperation

episodes.synopsis: Shikamaru is promoted to chunin. Lee decides to undergo a dangerous surgery so he can remain a ninja. Sasuke broods over Naruto getting stronger.
episodes.title: The Battle Begins: Naruto vs. Sasuke

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, but Kakashi arrives to stop the fight. Sasuke seeks revenge against his brother.
episodes.title: Bitter Rivals and Broken Bonds

episodes.synopsis: The Sound Ninja Four suddenly appear before Sasuke. Sakura is concerned about the Curse Mark placed on Sasuke by Orochimaru.
episodes.title: An Invitation from the Sound

episodes.synopsis: Sakura's pleas fall on deaf ears, and Sasuke leaves Hidden Leaf Village. Tsunade summons Shikamaru to lead his first mission as a chunin.
episodes.title: Formation! The Sasuke Retrieval Squad!

episodes.synopsis: The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimaru's lair with Sasuke. They're challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido, but the Leaf ninja are fatigued.
episodes.title: Sound vs. Leaf

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobo's Earth Dome Prison. The five slowly weaken as Jirobo drains their chakra from without.
episodes.title: Squad Mutiny: Everything Falls Apart!

episodes.synopsis: Freed from the Earth Dome Prison, Shikamaru and the others take off after the remaining Sound while Choji stays behind to face his challenger alone.
episodes.title: Full Throttle Power! Choji, Ablaze!

episodes.synopsis: After Choji takes the yellow pill, it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State. Choji has only one option left.
episodes.title: Good-bye Old Friend! I'll Always Believe in You!

episodes.synopsis: Assuming the Leaf squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninjas don't bother to lay traps along the way, so Shikamaru poses as Jirobo.
episodes.title: Your Opponent is Me!

episodes.synopsis: Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others pursue Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja. Neji uses his Gentle Fist and Kidomaru must find Neji's weakness.
episodes.title: 360 Degrees of Vision: The Byakugan's Blind Spot!

episodes.synopsis: Kidomaru changes tactics and creates a bow and arrow to attack Neji's blind spot. Can Neji turn Kidomaru's attack back onto the attacker?
episodes.title: Losing is Not an Option!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Meanwhile, Orochimaru lies on the verge of death.
episodes.title: The Vessel Arrives Too Late

episodes.synopsis: Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon, but an incensed Sakon turns the tables. Meanwhile, Tayuya steadily advances towards Naruto's team.
episodes.title: Miscalculation: A New Enemy Appears!

episodes.synopsis: Shikamaru tries to stop Tayuya, who uses her Summoning Jutsu to call forth three giants. And the battle between Kimimaro and Naruto is about to begin.
episodes.title: Roar and Howl! The Ultimate Tag-Team!

episodes.synopsis: Ukon enters Kiba's body. Naruto is shocked by the power of Kimimaro's Kekkai Genkai, and Shikamaru is in a desperate battle with Tayuya.
episodes.title: To Each His Own Battle

episodes.synopsis: An injured Kiba and Akamaru barely escape from Sakon and Ukon. Naruto is locked in battle with Kimimaro, and Shikamaru fights Tayuya's three giants.
episodes.title: Fakeout: Shikamaru's Comeback!

episodes.synopsis: Shikamaru succeeds in trapping Tayuya, but Tayuya fights back. Kiba tends to Akamaru and his own wounds. Naruto is having trouble defeating Kimimaro.
episodes.title: The Leaf's Handsome Devil!

episodes.synopsis: With Rock Lee there to take on Kimimaro, Naruto is free to chase after Sasuke. Lee attacks, and Kimimaro is pushed back by Lee's fierce taijutsu.
episodes.title: The Beast Within

episodes.synopsis: Shikamaru, Kiba and Lee are at the limits of their strength when Gaara, Temari and Kankuro appear to assist their Leaf allies.
episodes.title: The Sand Shinobi: Allies of the Leaf

episodes.synopsis: Kimimaro realizes that close combat is impossible against Gaara's wall of sand, so he moves further away for a long-distance attack. Gaara is unfazed.
episodes.title: Showdown: Gaara vs. Kimimaro!

episodes.synopsis: Kimimaro shatters Gaara's sand shield and attacks Gaara. Naruto finally catches up to Sasuke, who is racing to his destiny at Orochimaru's hands.
episodes.title: Vengeful Strike! The Bracken Dance!

episodes.synopsis: With the Curse Mark covering half his body, Sasuke is changed. Naruto charges at this new Sasuke who has turned his back on his closest comrades.
episodes.title: A Cry on Deaf Ears

episodes.synopsis: Sasuke is determined to go to Orochimaru. He tells Naruto that in order to surpass his brother, Itachi, power and hatred are necessary.
episodes.title: Brothers: Distance Among the Uchiha

episodes.synopsis: Naruto is brought down by Sasuke's Fireball Jutsu. This was the first jutsu Sasuke's father taught him when he was a boy.
episodes.title: Father and Son, the Broken Crest

episodes.synopsis: Sasuke watches Naruto sink in the water. He recalls when his friends and parents were killed by Itachi, who had mastered the Mangekyo Sharingan jutsu.
episodes.title: The Secrets of the Mangekyo Sharingan!

episodes.synopsis: Kakashi uses his Summoning Jutsu and sends ninja dogs to track Naruto and Sasuke. With his newfound strength, Sasuke sets out to bring down Naruto.
episodes.title: For a Friend

episodes.synopsis: Naruto releases his Nine-Tail chakra and sends Sasuke flying. Sasuke accuses Naruto, who doesn't have a family, of not understanding his feelings.
episodes.title: A Plea From a Friend

episodes.synopsis: Naruto's Nine-Tail chakra seems to move with a will of its own as it counters Sasuke's powerful attacks. Sasuke's body undergoes a transformation.
episodes.title: The End of Tears

episodes.synopsis: The fierce battle with Sasuke leaves Naruto unconscious, and Kakashi arrives at his side. Shikamaru is deeply affected by the failure of the mission.
episodes.title: The Promise That Could Not Be Kept

episodes.synopsis: Sakura tries to sneak out of the village to find Sasuke but Naruto intercepts her. They're sent to the Land of Rice Paddies where Sasuke's been taken.
episodes.title: Deep Cover?! A Super S-Rank Mission

episodes.synopsis: Naruto, Sakura and Jiraiya search for information in the Land of Rice Paddies. Naruto and Sakura meet Sasame, who is being pursued by an assailant.
episodes.title: A Town of Outlaws! The Shadow of the Fuma Clan

episodes.synopsis: Naruto, Sakura and Sasame are attacked by Kamikiri, Jigumo and Kagero of the Fuma Clan. Jiraiya arrives just in time and joins in the fight.
episodes.title: Pure Betrayal, and a Fleeting Plea!

episodes.synopsis: Jiraiya uses his Summoning Jutsu to call out Gamakichi. With Gamakichi leading, the shinobi advance up winding stairways and through long tunnels.
episodes.title: Pure Terror! The House of Orochimaru

episodes.synopsis: Just as Kabuto's about to hurl his kunai at Sakura, Naruto forces Kabuto to use up his knives. Kabuto responds with his Misty Flames Dance Jutsu.
episodes.title: Two Heartbeats: Kabuto's Trap

episodes.synopsis: Naruto tries to shield Sakura from an attack and is wounded by Kamikiri. Arashi unleashes Fuma Ninja Art -- the Spell of the Mandala, a secret jutsu.
episodes.title: Sakura's Determination!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto gets upset when Jiraiya sets out on a mission without him. Tsunade comes across a piece of important data from the Maximum Security Prison.
episodes.title: The Three Villains from the Maximum Security Prison

episodes.synopsis: Shizune pursues Mizuki, who has escaped from the Maximum Security Prison. Naruto senses Orochimaru is behind Mizuki's escape and approaches Tsunade.
episodes.title: Tonton! I'm Counting on You!

episodes.synopsis: Raijin and Fujin possess superhuman strength. Naruto uses his Shadow Clone Jutsu to buy time, but then a super-strong trio appears to help him out.
episodes.title: A New Squad! Two People and a Dog?!

episodes.synopsis: Shikamaru, Ino and Choji come to the rescue. The three have been sent by Tsunade to assist, allowing Naruto and Pakkun to go after Mizuki.
episodes.title: A New Formation: Ino-Shika-Cho!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto discovers that Tsubaki is Mizuki's fiancée. When Mizuki attacks the Nara medical research team, Tsunade wonders what Mizuki was after.
episodes.title: Orochimaru's Shadow!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and Iruka are left in a daze by the power of Mizuki's chakra. Naruto counters with a jutsu but is quickly rebuffed. Iruka brings out his kunai.
episodes.title: A Clash of Fate: You Can't Bring Me Down!

episodes.synopsis: Kiba, Shino and Hinata have come up with an idea to use the Bikochu beetle -- a rare beetle with a keen sense of smell -- to find Sasuke.
episodes.title: The Search for the Rare Bikochu Beetle

episodes.synopsis: Squad 8 and Naruto arrive at the Bikochu's habitat. They use a photo to aid their search, but Naruto can't tell the difference between the bugs.
episodes.title: What's the Difference? Don't All Insects Look Alike?

episodes.synopsis: Hinata's kidnapped by the Kamizuru Clan. To find the hidden scroll of their founder, which contains forbidden jutsu, they search for a Bikochu beetle.
episodes.title: A Battle of Bugs! The Deceivers and the Deceived!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto, Kiba and Shino are cornered in the hive of a queen bee. Shino declares that unless Hinata is freed, they will not hand over the Bikochu.
episodes.title: Blaze Away, Byakugan! This Is My Ninja Way!!

episodes.synopsis: Tsunade orders Naruto, Lee, Neji and Tenten on a mission to the Katabami Gold Mine to remove the Kurosuki Family, who have taken over the town.
episodes.title: Funeral March for the Living

episodes.synopsis: The Kurosuki gang captures Rokusuke, and Raiga tells him that he will hold a funeral for him. Naruto can no longer keep his temper in check.
episodes.title: A Lesson Learned! The Iron Fist of Love!

episodes.synopsis: Raiga and Ranmaru use their Hidden Mist jutsu to conceal themselves in Katabami Gold Mine, where even Neji's Byakugan can't detect them.
episodes.title: The Enemy of the Byakugan

episodes.synopsis: The Kurosuki family is dispersed, and peace returns to Katabami Gold Mine. However, Karashi seems to be up to something.
episodes.title: The Dark Creeping Clouds

episodes.synopsis: Raiga comes back to life and sees Ranmaru lying deathly still on the ground. Despondent, Raiga unleashes violent thunder. Tenten tries to stop Raiga.
episodes.title: Raiga's Counterattack

episodes.synopsis: Lee keeps on fighting desperately, but the tornado that envelops Raiga's attack takes the form of a dragon and swallows him up.
episodes.title: Run! The Curry of Life!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto is chosen to lead Konohamaru, Moegi and Udon in a survival training exercise, and they set off for Mount Takurami to find a secret scroll.
episodes.title: Follow My Lead! The Great Survival Challenge!

episodes.synopsis: Tsunade orders Naruto, Hinata, Kiba and Akamaru to capture Gosunkugi, a thief. They head to the Land of Stone, where they suspect he's hiding.
episodes.title: The Bounty Hunter from the Wilderness

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and the others tend to an injured Sazanami, who says that he's trying to clear his name after being framed for a murder committed by Gosunkugi.
episodes.title: Hunt or Be Hunted?! Showdown at the O.K. Temple

episodes.synopsis: Two impostors dressed like Guy and Lee sneak into Hidden Leaf Village. Most of the villagers see through their disguises, but Naruto is fooled.
episodes.title: The Appearance of Strange Visitors

episodes.synopsis: The Land of Birds is in turmoil due to a specter known as the Cursed Warrior. Tsunade agrees to send Naruto, Neji, Lee and Tenten to help.
episodes.title: The Cursed Warrior

episodes.synopsis: The group begins to suspect that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot by Komei, the village strategist, and sets out to visit Sagi, the feudal lord.
episodes.title: The Tactician’s Intent

episodes.synopsis: Komei is arrested for his connection to the Cursed Warrior, but Naruto is skeptical and decides to investigate the mystery further.
episodes.title: Too Late for Help

episodes.synopsis: Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi and return to the village with him, but Kakashi senses that they are being followed.
episodes.title: The Death of Naruto

episodes.synopsis: Now that the true culprit has been discovered, Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi consumed with hate.
episodes.title: When Time Stands Still

episodes.synopsis: At Moso's mansion, a battle takes place between the Wandering ninja and the Leaf ninja. Thanks to Chishima, Naruto is released from Moso's genjutsu.
episodes.title: When Egrets Flap Their Wings

episodes.synopsis: Choji and Naruto help the owner of a ramen shop when his daughter is kidnapped by ninja chefs trying to get their hands on his secret recipes.
episodes.title: Mix It! Stretch It! Boil It! Burn Copper! Burn!

episodes.synopsis: Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino and Shino to destroy an ocean monster that's wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea.
episodes.title: Remembrance: The Lost Page

episodes.synopsis: Naruto recovers from the latest attack with the help of a young girl named Isaribi. Anko and the others meet with officials from the Land of the Sea.
episodes.title: The Closed Door

episodes.synopsis: Anko begins to remember that Demon Island was a place she once visited with her former sensei, and she reveals the truth behind the disappearances.
episodes.title: Infiltration: The Set-Up!!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and the others finally manage to flee Demon Island, only to encounter another battle when Amachi and his gang attack the Land of the Sea fleet.
episodes.title: Despair: A Fractured Heart

episodes.synopsis: Naruto lends a hand to the Hidden Leaf ninja as they battle it out with Amachi at sea. Suddenly, a monstrous new threat emerges.
episodes.title: Battle at Sea: The Power Unleashed!!

episodes.synopsis: When the wealthiest man in the Land of Fire visits Tsunade, Naruto takes his spoiled son under his wing and teaches him an important lesson.
episodes.title: Impossible! Celebrity Ninja Art: Money Style Jutsu!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto, Kiba and Hinata are given a new assignment: search for buried treasure at the request of Tsunade's friend Agari Kaisen.
episodes.title: The Treasure Hunt Is On!

episodes.synopsis: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin, but they have already invaded the Village Hidden in the Leaves.
episodes.title: Run, Dodge, Zigzag! Chase or Be Chased!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto discovers that Jiraiya is putting off his training. He decides to finish writing Jiraiya's manuscript for him so it won't be a distraction.
episodes.title: Please, Mr. Postman!

episodes.synopsis: The Village Hidden in the Stars asks the Hidden Leaf Village to guard a star with mysterious powers that's coveted by the Five Great Ninja Nations.
episodes.title: Encounter! The Boy with a Star's Name

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and the others investigate the whereabouts of the stolen star and begin to suspect it was an inside job.
episodes.title: The Remembered Lullaby

episodes.synopsis: The identity of the masked ninja who kidnapped Sumaru is revealed, and Tenten and Lee mount a mission to rescue their friend.
episodes.title: Hidden Jutsu! The Price of the Ninja Art: Kujaku

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and Natsuhi, the masked ninja, fall into the depths of the valley. While tending to Naruto's injuries, Natsuhi explains why she stole the star.
episodes.title: Hoshikage: The Buried Truth

episodes.synopsis: Natsuhi's body is already reacting to the effects of the star. She desperately confronts Akahoshi, but the star falls into his hands.
episodes.title: Reunion: The Remaining Time

episodes.synopsis: When Sumaru senses his mother's death from afar and runs off, Hokuto and Mizura risk their lives to reveal the truth behind the star training.
episodes.title: The Star's Radiance

episodes.synopsis: Kiba's ninja hound picks up a dangerous infection during a battle and begins to attack the residents of Konoha. The search is on for a cure.
episodes.title: Kiba's Long Day

episodes.synopsis: While Naruto trains in the forest, a mysterious being attaches itself to him and won't come off. Tsunade suspects it may be the legendary Onbaa.
episodes.title: A Legend from the Hidden Leaf: The Onbaa!!

episodes.synopsis: Sent to provide security at a funeral, Naruto and Shino soon discover that their actual mission involves an unusual request.
episodes.title: Laughing Shino

episodes.synopsis: During a mission to protect a band of merchants, Choji, Hinata and Naruto see ominous black smoke rising from the direction of the Land of Greens.
episodes.title: Open for Business! The Leaf Moving Service

episodes.synopsis: When they question Yurinoshin and Shun, the Hidden Leaf squad learns the truth about Shun's true identity.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Targeted Merchants

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and the others are assailed by Ruiga, the first evil ninja, who can draw water from the earth to use as a weapon.
episodes.title: A Limitless Supply of Ninja Tools

episodes.synopsis: Hinata arrives to help Naruto in his battle against the evil ninja Jiga. Jiga is a powerful enemy, but Hinata discovers a crack in his armor.
episodes.title: The Byakugan Sees the Blind Spot!

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and Haruna rush toward town, where they are confronted by Renga, who orders Naruto to hand over the princess.
episodes.title: Forecast: Death! Cloudy with Chance of Sun!

episodes.synopsis: Set to meet her fiancé in person for the first time, an overweight princess who's self-conscious about her looks hires Ino to impersonate her.
episodes.title: Ino Screams! Chubby Paradise!

episodes.synopsis: With so many missions lately, Lee is concerned that he hasn't been able to keep up with his training, so he opens a dojo.
episodes.title: Viva Dojo Challenge! Youth Is All About Passion!

episodes.synopsis: When the first lady of the Land of Honey and her entourage disappear, Naruto, Kiba and Hinata are sent on a mission and arrive at an eerie castle.
episodes.title: The Mysterious Curse of the Haunted Castle

episodes.synopsis: Lee receives unhappy news at his medical checkup when it's discovered that there's a lot of damage in his chakra network. Tsunade orders him to rest.
episodes.title: The Third Super-Beast!

episodes.synopsis: Seeking revenge on the man who defeated their father years ago, the impostor student and his brothers imprison Guy using a unique jutsu.
episodes.title: Hot-Blooded Confrontation: Student vs. Sensei

episodes.synopsis: When important blueprints of the Hidden Leaf Village are stolen, the ANBU Black Ops suspects the culprit is a carpenter who was friendly with Naruto.
episodes.title: Crisis: The Hidden Leaf 11 Gather!

episodes.synopsis: In order to delve into Genno's motives, ANBU Black Ops puts Naruto under reverse hypnosis, but they don't get much information.
episodes.title: The Anbu Gives Up? Naruto's Recollection

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and his team scramble to gather scattered blueprints that a bird drops over the village. Later, they make a shocking discovery at the academy.
episodes.title: The Missed Target

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and the others are shocked at the massive amounts of paper bombs placed throughout the village. They begin to carefully remove the seals.
episodes.title: The Powerful Helper

episodes.synopsis: Naruto confronts Genno, who has been alive all along. Shikamaru comes to the conclusion that all the traps found so far are diversionary.
episodes.title: Multiple Traps! Countdown to Destruction

episodes.synopsis: In this recap episode, hosts Naruto and Sakura revisit five epic battles, interview fellow ninjas and welcome a surprise special guest.
episodes.title: The Top 5 Ninja Battles!

episodes.synopsis: On the outskirts of town, Naruto encounters a young girl drawing a strange picture. Back at the village, Kurenai resigns as Team 8's leader.
episodes.title: Kurenai's Decision: Squad 8 Left Behind

episodes.synopsis: Naruto dreams that Yakumo wants to become a ninja and Kurenai threatens to seal her power. Meanwhile, mysterious ninja surround the villa.
episodes.title: Yakumo's Sealed Power

episodes.synopsis: When assailants from the Kurama Clan of Hidden Leaf Village attack, Kurenai unleashes her genjutsu in an effort to protect Yakumo.
episodes.title: Kurenai's Top-Secret Mission: The Promise with the Third Hokage

episodes.synopsis: The team returns to Hidden Leaf in order to tend to Kurenai and Yakumo's injuries, but they find the village in ruins.
episodes.title: Genjutsu or Reality?

episodes.synopsis: Naruto goes to Yakumo's studio, where he finds Kurenai in a desperate situation. Yakumo wrestles with an evil entity in her subconscious.
episodes.title: The Supposed Sealed Ability

episodes.synopsis: Naruto and Kiba are dispatched to guard a prized tea bowl, but their client puts them in harm's way again and again.
episodes.title: The Weight of the Prized Artifact!

episodes.synopsis: Gantetsu, a former member of a gang of rogue ninja thieves, makes a request for a guarded escort from the Hidden Leaf Village.
episodes.title: The Enemy: Ninja Dropouts

episodes.synopsis: After dodging an attack by the Ninja Dropouts, Naruto, Gantetsu and Todoroki cut through the forest, where they sense something odd is at play.
episodes.title: The Bewildering Forest

episodes.synopsis: The relationship between Gantetsu and Todoroki is revealed. Meanwhile, Sakura and Lee are surrounded by children demanding Gantetsu's return.
episodes.title: Memory of Flames

episodes.synopsis: Team Leaf is finally reunited. After a heated battle, Naruto has the enemy cornered, but Todoroki's younger brother, Akio, is taken.
episodes.title: To Each His Own Path

episodes.synopsis: Naruto comes across an injured young man who has lost his memory. Impressed by his kindness, Naturo insists on letting him stay in the village.
episodes.title: Vanished Memories

episodes.synopsis: Tsunade thinks Menma is connected to the Hidden Sound Village, so Naruto and the others head for the Land of Rice Paddies to check into his memories.
episodes.title: Bringing Back Reality

episodes.synopsis: Just as the angry villagers are about to attack Menma, the bandits strike again and accuse him of being a traitor to their gang.
episodes.title: A Past to Be Erased

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious group called the Four Celestials kidnaps ninja candidate Matsuri. Tsunade receives a request for help from the Sand.
episodes.title: The Village of Artisans: The Targeted Shukaku

episodes.synopsis: Shikamaru sends Shino, Hinata and Neji to search for the enemy while the Shikamaru squad waits for the right moment to attack.
episodes.title: The Village of Artisans: Sand Alliance with the Leaf Shinobi

episodes.synopsis: Although Gaara seems to be gaining ground on his opponents, he is slowly being drawn into a trap and gets caught in their secret jutsu.
episodes.title: The Village of Artisans: The Counterattack!

episodes.synopsis: Gaara and Naruto corner Hoko, the last of the Four Celestials, in a gully. He reveals that they were once shinobi from the Village of Artisans.
episodes.title: The Village of Artisans: The Ultimate Weapon Reborn

episodes.synopsis: Gaara transforms into Shukaku the Sand Spirit and manages an impressive win. After the battle, Naruto sets off on a training journey with Jiraiya.
episodes.title: The Village of Artisans: Departure
